spec_data.Name: mozilla-requestpolicy
spec_data.Description:
RequestPolicy is a Firefox extension that gives you control over
cross-site requests. It does this through user-defined white-lists
and blacklists. Users can also subscribe to policies
(white-lists and blacklists) maintained by others.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 21 Oct 2017 09:38:06 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Firefox and Seamonkey extension that gives you control over cross-site requests
